Package com.boole.jgmp.math.shapes

Class JGMPRay2

java.lang.Object
com.boole.jgmp.math.shapes.JGMPRay2
public class JGMPRay2 extends Object
2D Ray Shape Model for the JGMP Library.
Includes many optimized tools for not only Rays (line segments) but also lines.
Basic Linear Algebra functions and utilities avaialable.

  • Constructor Details

    • JGMPRay2

      public JGMPRay2(float distance, JGMPVector2 start, JGMPVector2 direction)
      Initialize JGMPRay2 objects given starting point, distance and direction.
      Based on the given information, the end point will be automatically calculated and set.
      Parameters:
      distance - distance float value
      start - JGMPVector2 starting point
      direction - JGMPVector2 ending point

    • JGMPRay2

      public JGMPRay2(JGMPVector2 start, JGMPVector2 end)
      Initialize JGMPRay2 objects given starting point, ending point.
      Based on the given information, the length of the line and the direction from the starting point to the ending point will be automatically calculated and set.
      Parameters:
      start - JGMPVector2 starting point
      end - JGMPVector2 ending point

  • Method Details

    • copy

      public JGMPRay2 copy()
      Copies the JGMPRay2 object's contents into another object.
      Returns:
      JGMPRay2 2D Ray copy

    • shortestDistanceFrom

      public float shortestDistanceFrom(JGMPRay2 line)
      Calculates the shortest distance between the current line segment and a different given line segment.
      Gets the pair of the 2 closest points between the 2 lines, rotates the graph to align one of the lines to the x-axis and one of the points to the origin. and draws a line between them and 2 perpendicular lines at each selected point. The shortest distance among all the 3 lines will be the shortest distance between the 2 given lines.
      Parameters:
      line - JGMPRay2 Second line segment to find the distance from the current JGMPRay2.
      Returns:
      shortest distance float value

    • shortestDistanceFrom

      public float shortestDistanceFrom(JGMPVector2 point)
      Calculates the shortest distance between the current line segment and a different given point.
      This function will treat the JGMPRay2 as a straight line where both endpoints will be infinitely extended just like a line.
      Parameters:
      point - JGMPVector2 A point to find the distance from the current 2D Ray.
      Returns:
      shortest distance float value
